mapper.select: SELECT p.title, p.price, p.createTime, f.fileURL FROM Product p, File f WHERE f.productID=p.productID AND f.type=1 ORDER BY p.createTime DESC limit 12
SELECT p.title, p.productID, u.email, u.name FROM Product p, User u WHERE p.accountID=#{id} AND u.id=#{id} ORDER BY p.createTime DESC
SELECT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM User WHERE id=#{id} limit 1) as success
